item.title: Mobile Screencast: Android to OBS via RTMP & IP Camera
item.description: Mobile screencasting allows you to display your mobile device’s screen on another device, such as a computer, often for recording or live streaming. This is particularly useful for creating tutorials, showcasing mobile games, delivering presentations, or simply mirroring your phone’s display to a larger screen.
